title.value: Gaussian-process-based Bayesian optimization for neurostimulation interventions in rats
title.justification: The title is explicitly mentioned several times in the document "Gaussian-process-based Bayesian optimization for neurostimulation interventions in rats".
title.quote: Gaussian-process-based Bayesian optimization for neurostimulation interventions in rats

extractions.description: The paper discusses the use of Gaussian-process (GP)-based Bayesian optimization (BO) to optimize neurostimulation parameters in rats for maximizing electromyographic responses. A protocol is proposed for implanting rats with electrode arrays and using GP-BO for real-time optimization of stimulation parameters. The approach provides a flexible framework for solving high-dimensional optimization problems in clinical settings.

type.justification: The paper predominantly discusses the theoretical framework of the Gaussian-process-based Bayesian optimization algorithm and outlines a protocol for its implementation.
type.quote: A primer on Gaussian-process-based Bayesian optimization algorithm is presented

name.justification: The paper focuses on neurostimulation interventions and optimization of neural responses, which falls under Neural Engineering.
name.quote: Effective neural stimulation requires adequate parametrization. Gaussian-process (GP)-based Bayesian optimization (BO) offers a framework to discover optimal stimulation parameters in real time.

name.justification: The paper specifically discusses optimization of neurostimulation interventions and neuroprosthetic paradigms.
name.quote: ...we first provide a general protocol to deploy this framework in neurostimulation interventions...

name.justification: The paper discusses the use of Gaussian-process-based Bayesian optimization for parameter optimization, indicating its relevance in Bayesian Optimization.
name.quote: ...Gaussian-process (GP)-based Bayesian optimization (BO) algorithms are a powerful framework...

name.justification: The paper involves experimental procedures on rats to test neurostimulation interventions.
name.quote: ...implant rats with multi-channel electrode arrays in the hindlimb motor cortex...

name.value: Rat and NHPs cortical stimulation datasets
name.justification: The paper references existing datasets used for neurostimulation experiments in rats.
name.quote: The complete cortical mapping dataset consisting of 4 NHPs and 6 rats is publicly available as of the date of publication at the following Open Science Framework Repository Database: https://osf.io/54vhx/

referenced_paper_title.value: Autonomous optimization of neuroprosthetic stimulation parameters that drive the motor cortex and spinal cord outputs in rats and monkeys
referenced_paper_title.justification: The dataset is referenced in relation to cited work by Bonizzato et al. 2023.
referenced_paper_title.quote: For complete details on the use and execution of this protocol, please refer to Bonizzato and colleagues (2023). ^{1}

name.justification: The toolkit EduOptimNeurostim is used for running the optimization algorithm discussed in the paper.
name.quote: ...our GitHub library into an appropriate folder (See key resources table).

referenced_paper_title.value: Autonomous optimization of neuroprosthetic stimulation parameters that drive the motor cortex and spinal cord outputs in rats and monkeys
referenced_paper_title.justification: The library is linked to the algorithm optimization work described by Bonizzato et al. 2023.
